data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: A series of wars following the breakup of Yugoslavia, including the Kosovo War.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Displacement of millions within the Balkans and migration to Western Europe and North America.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Initiated by the U.S. after the September 11 attacks, leading to conflicts in Afghanistan and Iraq.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Millions displaced internally and internationally, notably from Afghanistan and Iraq.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Ongoing conflict between the Syrian government and various factions.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Over 6 million Syrians fled the country, causing a global refugee crisis.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Economic collapse and political turmoil under the Bolivarian government.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: More than 7 million Venezuelans emigrated, primarily to neighboring Latin American countries.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Armed conflict between Ukrainian forces and separatist groups.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Displacement of millions within Ukraine and migration to neighboring countries.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Surge in refugees and migrants entering Europe from the Middle East and Africa.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Over 1 million people sought asylum in Europe, leading to significant political and social challenges.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Persecution of the Rohingya Muslim minority in Myanmar.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Approximately 700,000 Rohingya fled to Bangladesh, creating one of the world's largest refugee camps.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Full-scale invasion leading to widespread conflict.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Europe's largest refugee crisis since WWII, with millions fleeing to neighboring countries.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Initiated by the Obama administration, DACA allows certain undocumented individuals who entered the U.S. as children to receive a renewable two-year deferral from deportation and become eligible for a work permit, provided they meet specific criteria.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Protected over 800,000 individuals ('Dreamers') from deportation, allowing them access to work, education, and other opportunities.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Signed by President Trump, this executive order restricted travel from several predominantly Muslim countries, citing national security concerns.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Separated families, stranded travelers, and created legal challenges. Affected thousands seeking entry into the U.S., including refugees.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: Implemented by the Trump administration, it expanded the criteria for denying green cards to immigrants likely to require public benefits.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Discouraged immigrant families from accessing public assistance programs, impacting their health, housing, and financial stability.

data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Description: President Biden rescinded the travel bans enacted under the Trump administration, aiming to restore U.S. immigration policies.
data-5da39350f8c72fbf38c0c7c85fb9db22.Migration Impact: Allowed individuals from previously restricted countries to travel and immigrate, reuniting families and promoting global exchange.
